mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS id, m.icon AS icon, ( CASE WHEN (pm.id = 0 OR pm.id IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE pm.id END ) AS parentId, m.name as name, m.url as url, m.levels as levels, m.is_menu as ismenu, m.sort as num FROM sefarm_sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sefarm_sys_menu pm ON m.pcode = pm.code INNER JOIN ( SELECT ssrm.sys_menu_id AS id FROM sefarm_sys_role_menu ssrm WHERE ssrm.sys_role_id = #{roleId} ) ssm ON m.id = ssm.id WHERE m.is_menu = 1 ORDER BY m.levels ASC , m.sort DESC
SELECT sys_menu_id FROM sefarm_sys_role_menu WHERE sys_role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT ssm.id AS id, ( CASE WHEN (pssm.id = 0 OR pssm.id IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE pssm.id END ) AS pId, ssm.name AS name, ( CASE WHEN (pssm.id = 0 OR pssm.id IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) AS open FROM sefarm_sys_menu ssm LEFT JOIN sefarm_sys_menu pssm ON pssm.code = ssm.pcode ORDER BY ssm.id ASC
